source_objects.title: Food & Beverage
source_objects.description: Learn how to decorate a cake, prepare a gourmet meal, identify different wine varietals and much more.

items.title: Cooking Burgers
items.headline: Learn everything about cooking your own burgers from scratch: buns, patties, sauces, toppings. All in one place!
objectives_summary: cooking burgers
cooking burger buns
cooking burger toppings

items.title: Making the best soft cake and Plated Dessert

visible_instructors.title: Teerin Teinsoot
visible_instructors.job_title: Pastry Chef and Owner of Thai restaurant.
visible_instructors.name: Teerin

items.headline: Learn how to make great looking and tasting dessert like a 5stars for students who love sweets but lack of skills
objectives_summary: Bake the best soft cakes
Bake several flavor of soft cakes : vanilla and chocolate soft cakes
Decorate several type of cakes

items.title: INDIAN SNACKS & APPETIZERS- Restaurant style cooking course
items.headline: Learn - Base marinades (red, yellow, green and white) and snacks like tandoori chicken, paneer tikka, malai tikka, seekh
objectives_summary: Kababs, Tikkas, Tikkis & Snacks cooked with master marinades

items.title: Intro to the Wide World of Whisky
items.headline: Bourbon, Rye, Scotch and more
caption_languages: ภาษาอังกฤษ [อัตโนมัติ]
objectives_summary: How whisky is made, how different whiskies differ, how to nose and taste whiskies

items.title: How to Prevent Food Poisoning using The Food Safety Pillars
items.headline: Build a Food Safety Culture that will allow you to create a sustainable food safety system in your kitchen
objectives_summary: Implement the correct cleaning and sanitising procedures
Identify the critical, major and minor risks in the kitchen
Develop cleaning schedules

items.title: Learn The Pastry Arts - The World Of Cookies

visible_instructors.title: Marco Ropke
visible_instructors.job_title: Fourth Generation Pastry Chef, Twenty Five (25) Years Exp.
visible_instructors.name: Marco

items.headline: Learn from Marco Ropke a fourth generation pastry chef with twenty five (25) years of international experience.
objectives_summary: Demystify the world of pastry! With the skill set learnt you will not just learn recipes, but learn methods and understanding behind pastry arts.
By the end of this course all of your friends and family will be raving about your pastry skills.
Know why things turn out right, and why they sometimes turn out wrong. Understand the science behind the pastry arts!

items.title: Know Your Dough
items.headline: In-depth insights on how to bake your best breads ever!
objectives_summary: Understand your dough and develop your baking judgement
Get recipes and techniques for handling a variety of dough types: wet / dry / heritage / lean / enriched / fancy etc.
Judge different stages of fermentation more accurately.

items.title: Raw Chocolate Making With Chocomama
items.headline: Learn how to create delicious, healthy, vegan, raw chocolate in your own kitchen
objectives_summary: To make delicious, healthy, vegan, raw chocolate.
How to make raw chocolate from scratch.
The equipment and ingredients you'll need to make raw chocolate at home.

items.title: Crash Course on Wine - Wine 101

visible_instructors.title: Ryan Vet
visible_instructors.job_title: Entreprenuer, TV Host, Speaker, Author and Sommelier
visible_instructors.name: Ryan

items.headline: The 10 Things You Need to Know About Wine for Everyday Life - Presented by Sommelier Ryan Vet
objectives_summary: Answers to common questions about wine for the wine novice
Gain insights into picking the perfect bottle off a wine list or at the store
Understand the fundamentals of the ideal food and wine pairing

items.title: Making Homemade Wine: A Step-by-Step Guide!
items.headline: Don't just learn about wine, learn how to make wine! Everything you need to know in one place, with video demonstration.
objectives_summary: Produce homemade wine (from juice) by following an easy to follow, step-by step process
Make your very own custom dry red table wine or sweet red wine
Understand wine making terminology

items.title: 92 Best Authentic Japanese Food Recipes Cooking Class

visible_instructors.title: Pearl Ishizaki
visible_instructors.job_title: YouTuber & Home chef from the Philippines who lives in Japan
visible_instructors.name: Pearl

items.headline: The complete online cookbook for homemade Japanese dishes featuring the most popular dishes from  Japan.
objectives_summary: Prepare homemade Japanese food
Serve delicious and healthy meals for your loved ones.
Get deeper knowledge about Japanese cooking methods and techniques.

items.title: Become Great with Coffee |  From Beginner to Barista
items.headline: Learn more about the beginstages of coffee, different brewing methods and the World of Latte Art.
objectives_summary: Being able to make the most beautiful pieces of latte art with little effort
A deeper insight in the world of coffee and latte art
A better understanding in different ways to make a good cup of coffee

items.title: Instant Pot Master Course: become an amazing cook
items.headline: A Complete Guide to the Instant Pot Pressure Cooker- learn the secrets of cooking like a Pro
objectives_summary: Create amazing dishes with the Instant Pot
Be skilled with your gadget, and maybe you may come up with your own cookbook soon.
Feel confident about using your Instant Pot in your daily life

items.title: The Gluten Free Sourdough Masterclass
items.headline: Think like a baker, beat "bubble trouble" and bake better GF sourdough than ever before!
objectives_summary: How to bake naturally gluten free sourdough breads, baguettes, brioche, focaccia, doughnuts (!) and crackers.
Top tips for building starters and a starter fitness test
Handle young, mature and old leavens with the four leaven levers.

items.title: Baking Cupcakes

visible_instructors.title: Academy of Film Fashion and Design
visible_instructors.display_name: Academy of Film Fashion and Design
visible_instructors.name: Academy of Film

items.headline: Learn how to Bake Cupcakes 101
objectives_summary: Students will learn the fundamentals of preparation from scratch, different types of cupcakes, flavorings, colors, icing, decorating tips, fondant, and basic items made in a bakery..and much more.

items.title: Delicious Cake Recipes for your Kitchen - Cake Baking Course
items.headline: Cake Baking Course to kick your Taste Bud | Ten Delicious Cake Recipe to improve your Baking |
objectives_summary: Basic of Baking
Basic of Cake Making
Cake Decoration
